name: Jelly Crush Match 3: Candy Blast Mania For Kids
name_original: Jelly Crush Match 3: Candy Blast Mania For Kids
description:
Join the adventure into the Candy Kingdom, traveling through the magic land! Use your wits to solve hundreds of puzzles and enjoy the sweet taste with Jelly Fruit Match 3.

-------------------------------


Jelly Fruit Match 3 is a completely free game good for relaxation and recreation with hundreds of exciting new gameplay and beautiful with many different candy items.

-------------------------------


Jelly Fruit Match 3 features

● Jump position candies to complete the puzzle.

● Nice Graphics makes you hungrier.

● Various types of puzzles that make you feel fun to play.

● Break the chocolate to complete the game screen.

● Unlock gameplay you will meet interesting new items and more beautiful.

● Easy and fun to create an intellectually challenging game with the difficulty level.

● Hundreds of sweet candy level is updated each month.

● Easily sync and settings on different devices.

-------------------------------

If you are a fan of Jelly Fruit Match 3, please visit us regularly at:

http://binbell.com/

And our last words to thank you for playing Jelly Fruit Match 3, wish you exciting adventures in the kingdom of sweets.
